cause.description:
Dead babies stay crunchy in milk!! C'mon, it's population control AND it ends world hunger. Give in to your animalistic urges, and eat a dead baby today!
1. Cannibalism is population control.
2. People are plentiful, orphanages are full.
3. Ends world hunger.
cause.mission: Prove that dead babies taste good, and we should be allowed to eat them.
cause.name: Legalize Cannibalism
